item.description:
Join me for an award winning happy hour at McCormick & Schmick’s in Faneuil Hall. Come unwind after a long day at work. Don't miss out on the $1.95 bar menu!

While McCormick & Schmick’s has been recognized for its culinary excellence as the “best seafood restaurant” in cities across the country, the restaurants have also become equally famous for their $1.95 bar food menu featuring a half-pound cheese burger, steamed mussels and more. Guests can take in the lively atmosphere of the bar whether enjoying McCormicks & Schmick’s legendary seafood or simply a burger and a beer.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing an orange scarf.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Thirsty Thursday
